page.title: 10TEENAGE LIFE - LITTLE WITLEY
page.content: { My weekend}is very busy but at the end of it not much seems to have been done. On{Saturday morning}Mum and I usually go shopping. If we are in the vicinity we meet Dad and Stephen for lunch after they have played golf. {Saturday evening}usually means visiting friends or relations, or being visited which I enjoy, on the whole. {Sunday}entails going to church. Then I will clean the rabbit's hutch and afterwards, my bedroom. During the weekend I also have to get my college homework done and also clarinet and piano practice. I usually help Mum with the housework and dinners because she also has better things to do. We sometimes walk in the apple orchards, depending on the weather. I go to bed early on Sunday ready for yet another week. Helen Preece.
